data.text: Loved the 'The Works' if a little pricey. However, it was a very good quality breakfast. My only reservation is the fact it was packed, and bookings look to be advisable, if not essential. I'd happy visit again, but it's unlikely as I normally head out for a fry up on a whim or craving, and so booking up is not really practicable for me.
data.title: Fantastic Breakfast

data.text:
While in London for business, I wanted to experience a traditional English breakfast. My research pointed me to this location, so this is where I went. 

I went with "The Works", as I wanted to try everything. The portions were huge and while I knew I couldn't finish it all, I was determined to try a bit of everything.

I'm typically a picky eater, so my expectations were low for my own ability to enjoy what others would probably consider great. The one items I've had plenty of previous experience with and never did like were the mushrooms. I did try one and true to form, I did not care for it. I then ventured into new territory with the black pudding. I was probably the most nervous about this but found it to be sweeter than expected and quite enjoyable. The same went for the bubble and squeak, I was pleasantly surprised.

Overall, the meal was great!  The service was also top notch, and I would highly recommend this location and meal to anyone in the area. 

Thank you, Terry's, for a wonderful introduction into the world of the Fry-Up!
data.title: Fantastic English Breakfast.

data.text: What a gem of a find! My partner and I stumbled across Terrys Cafe by staying at a hotel nearby. We didnâ€™t want a boring modern hotel breakfast so ventured out, looking for a traditional British Cafe. Although incredibly busy (says it all) we were soon seated and attended to by Harriet. There was so many wonderful breakfast options but we both opted for the Hamlet breakfast, which was plentiful and very tasty! Thereâ€™s just not many places that offer good old tinned tomatoes, bubble & squeak and black pudding! Along with eggs, sausages and bacon, this really was an amazing breakfast! Everything was cooked to perfection. All washed down with a gorgeous cappuccino and my partner had a nice cup of brew! We only wished we lived closer!
data.title: Traditional English breakfast at its best!ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§

data.text:
Made a first visit to Terryâ€™s cafe having seen the excellent reviews and having spent the night in Southwark. 
Despite a short wait/queue to be seated the staff were all very attentive and the breakfast was absolutely faultless. 
It was a little on the pricey side but in fairness it certainly set us up for the day. Would recommend and would have no hesitation in visiting again.
data.title: A faultless full English! Pricey but justified.

data.text: After travelling 4h we finnaly arrived. Its was raining real heavy. There was no place  for our group. Didn't gave us ant recommendation and just left us there. I was hangery wet and dissapointed. Due to this experiencing. I would not recommend this place. You need to be Lucky to have seat
data.title: Not what we expected
